{{NCAATeamSeason |Mode=Basketball |sex=women |Year=2007-08 |Prev year=2006-07 |Next year=2008-09 |Team=Tulane Green Wave |Image= |Conference=Conference USA |division= |ShortConference=C-USA |CoachRank= |APRank= |Record= |ConfRecord= |HeadCoach= Lisa Stockton |AsstCoach1= Shanna Cook |AsstCoach2= Alan Frey |AsstCoach3= Michele Savage |StadiumArena=[[Fogelman Arena]] |capacity = |Champion= |BowlTourney=Conference USA Tournament |BowlTourneyResult= First Round }} The '''2007â08 Tulane Green Wave women's basketball team''' represented [[Tulane University]] in the 2007â08 NCAA Division I women's basketball season. The Green Wave were coached by [[Lisa Stockton]]. The Green Wave are a member of Conference USA and attempted to win the Conference USA Tournament.
==Exhibition== {|class="wikitable" width="80%" |- align="center" style="background:#063003;color:#CCEEFF;" | '''Date''' || '''Location''' || '''Opponent''' || '''Green Wave Points''' || '''Opp. Points''' || '''Record''' |- align="center" bgcolor="" | Nov. 1/07 || Fogelman Arena || Houston Jaguars || 88 ||71 ||1-0 |- align="center" bgcolor="" |}<ref name="tulanegreenwave.com">http://www.tulanegreenwave.com/sports/w-baskbl/sched/tul-w-baskbl-sched.html</ref>
==Regular season== *The Green Wave participated in the Caribbean Challenge in Cancun, Mexico from November 21 to 22. *The Green Wave participated in the [[Tulane Double Tree Classic|DoubleTree Classic]] from December 20 to 21.
